item.title: Japanese study books
item.description: A handbook of common Japanese phrases A handbook of common Japanese phrases, compiled by Sanseido, translated and adapted by John Brennan. OhioLink record John Brennan’s translation for Japanese learners of publishing house Sanseido’s book of language etiquette originally intended for Japanese native speakers has many common set phrases (highly developed and sometimes lengthy collocations) for congratulations, condolences, making speeches, giving gifts, addressing people (eleven set phrases for “Have you got a moment?
